title: munnum kavalai
sahitya:
munnum kavalai illai pinnum kavalai illai innum kavalai EnO mAyai pinnum kavalai EnO


anupallavi

  maNNum payanilAdu maraiyum ulaga mAndar madittAlum tudittAlum 
kodittAlum midittAlum karudip-padaiyAdE deivak-karuNaik-iNai EdE


caraNam    pirakkumun yArO irandapin yArO iruppading-ArO iDar sheivad-ArO
eNNip-pArdhyAnam paNNippAr uLLE naNNippAr nAnAr nI yAr
avanAr avaLAr aduvAr avai yAr anaittum shuddhAnanda shakti vilAsamE
